docs.snippet: In a somber, tear-filled ceremony, the Navy on Monday remembered a sailor who was fatally shot aboard a destroyer as a selfless hero who saved the lives of others....

headline.main: Navy Holds Memorial for Slain Sailor From Md.

docs.snippet: Serie A table-proppers Catania have sacked hapless coach Rolando Maran for the second time this season and Cagliari have fired Diego Lopez following defeats at the weekend....

docs.snippet: Norwich didn't fire Chris Hughton because he's black. The English soccer club fired him because it is petrified of dropping out of the Premier League and losing millions in revenue....

headline.main: English Soccer Is Now Without a Black Coach

docs.snippet: Christian Eriksen deflected some of the spotlight away from Tottenham Hotspur manager Tim Sherwood with two assists and a goal in his side's 5-1 hammering of relegation-haunted Sunderland in the Premier League on Monday....

docs.abstract: Kentucky men's basketball coach John Calipari, busy preparing his team for national title game against Connecticut, credits mysterious 'tweak' to Kentucky's offense for turning their season around.

headline.main: Calipari Credits a Mysterious ‘Tweak’ With Turning Kentucky’s Season Around
